title: kai koDuppAyE
sahitya:
kai koDuppAyE karuNAkaranE kai koDuttennaik-karai shErppAyE


anupallavi

  Ayya nIyenran kai piDittEgiDil aiyuravillAmal aDiyanEn varuvEn


caraNam    maruL nirai vAzhvinil vazhi ariyAmalE vADi iLaittEn manamigha nondEn
arul nirai pArvAiyODazhaittenai aNaippAyE Ananda nilai tanil anbuDan shErppAi
